title: Three Hour IntroductoryLesson With Cable Water Ski or Wake Board for £18 at WM Ski (£45 Value)
highlights:
• 30 mins onshore training and 2.5 hours on the water
  • Complete beginners start on kneeboards to ease in, with a 1-to-1 guidance to get you on to a wakeboard or skis
  • More advanced pupils can use the intro session to learn more complex cable techniques
  • Twenty pupils per session
  • All equipment provided

title: One Night Stay For Two With Bottle of Wine for£27.80 at The Old Station Inn (£69.50 Value)
highlights:
• Easily accessible from Bath and Bristol
  • Close to Wells, Bath Spa and Cabot Circus shopping mall
  • Awarded Brewery Pub of the Year
  • Crazy golf available
  • Enjoy alfresco dining and barbecue days

title: TwoAdult Tickets to See Swindon Robins Speedway Team for £14 at Swindon Speedway (£35 Value)
highlights:

  • 15 minutes from central Swindon
